channel.title: dApps on Anthony Dellavecchia
channel.description: Recent content in dApps on Anthony Dellavecchia

item.title: Web5 Self Service Identity
item.description: What is a Decentralized Identity? When you log into Facebook, you have to create an account and identity with them. When you log into Instagram, you have to do the same thing. When you log into TikTok, you do it again. For every website you use, you create an identity and that is stored and controlled by that corporation. What if you could create 1 identity and share it across all platforms?
